insert into tbl_member (membno, id, pw, name, nickName, phone,zonecode,roadAddress,buildingName, adress) values (#{membno}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{phone},#{zonecode},#{roadAddress},#{buildingName}, #{adress})
